text: wayadeu al'iinsan ahyanana ealaa nafsih 'aw waladih 'aw malah balshr, wdhlk eind alghdb, mithl ma yadeu balkhyr, whdha min jahl al'iinsan wejlth, wamin rahmat allah bih 'anah yastajib lah fi deayh bialkhayr dun alshr; li'anah yaelam minh edm alqsd 'iilaa 'iiradat dhlk, wakan al'iinsan btbeh ejwla
